entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
